name: Castle Defend
description:
This is LDjam 50 game.

The game is "technically" finished.

I feel like I put more effort into finishing the game rather than making the game actually fun.

Because there is no tutorial, you may need help (you definitely do need help) understanding how to play the game.

Using the mouse cursor, you can scroll up/down/left/right.

The sword/fireball button can be used to damage 'evil creatures.'

They will, however, use up Mana Points. Villages replenish small amounts of MP when you click End Turn.

If you click End turn, enemies will move and attempt to attack your villages, fortresses, and castles.

Defend as long as you can!
